name: Magic Tricks FREE - Learn Easy Cool Mind Blowing Illusion with Trick Tutorial Video Lessons
name_original: Magic Tricks FREE - Learn Easy Cool Mind Blowing Illusion with Trick Tutorial Video Lessons
description:
"WARNING: THESE MAGIC TRICKS ARE POWERFUL AND GET INSANE REACTIONS!"

Learn Mindblowing Magic Tricks with Easy Step by Step Video Tutorials!

"AWESOME NOW I CAN APPEAR TO LEVITATE!"

Discover the SECRETS professional magicians don't want revealed!

These are the same tricks performed by the likes of David Blaine, Criss Angel and David Copperfield. Forget the Masked Magician all you need is this app.

Whether you are a complete Noob to Magic or a Professional there is something for everyone. I will teach you every trick I have learned in 25+ years of performing magic.

HOW THE APP WORKS:

It's simple - just watch me perform one of the tricks so you know what it should look like to spectators then watch the explanation video and i'll teach you exactly how to do it, step by step! None of the tricks require any special things to perform the magic so don't worry!

LEARN:

• Self Levitation
• Coin Tricks
• Card Tricks
• Street Magic
• Rubberband Magic
• Sponge Ball Magic
• Sleight of Hand
• Mindreading & Mentalism
• Much, Much MORE!

Perform these tricks anywhere. Impress people in the pub, bar, restaurant or at school. You will be the talk of the town!

Download NOW 100% FREE.
